message:
Mufti Sahab's demise leaves a huge void in the nation & in J&K, where his exemplary leadership had a major impact on people's lives. What stood out about Mufti Sahab was his statesmanship. In his long political journey he won many admirers across the political spectrum. 

Mufti Sahab provided a healing touch to J&K through his leadership. He will be missed by all of us. Condolences to his family & supporters. RIP.
